General.Name: Eenergy Group PLC
General.Description: eEnergy Group Plc, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated energy services company in the United Kingdom and Ireland. It offers LED lighting solutions to education and commercial clients; and energy consultancy, procurement, analytics, and efficiency services. The company is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 32 Threadneedle Street, London, United Kingdom, EC2R 8AY
